item.title: ðŸ‘‘ 1st place Japanese Quiz AI competition, AIO 2nd
item.description: Our team, Revo, took 1st place in the Japanese Quiz AI competition, AIO (King of AI in Japanese) 2021-2022. The task of this competition is to answer questions without using the Internet but with pre-stored information on the developers’ own. We have developed RevoAI to tackle this task, and RevoAI achieved 83.9% accuracy on the test data and 1st place. If you want to know about the details of our approach, please contact me freely.
